matath budu dahame samahara than pahadili na.aththatama budun kiyapu de ee kalen pasuwa iwara wenna athi.pasuwa noyek dena noyek de kiyanawa,liyanawa.budun jiwath wu indiyaweth adu janathawak thamayi me dharmaya samaga hitiye.pasuwa enna ennama adu una.api eeka apita oonalesa mod karagaththa.lankawe api kiyanne api thamayi ayithikarayo kiyala.gihi jiwithaye hitha supirisinduwa yanna ba.prayogika thathwaya eekane.aleksandarata bole bassapu un niyameta innawa.unge idiriyath top.wade kiyanne aleksandaratath naraka na.kalaya enakam pod let ekak witharane.anthimata baluwama un okkoma dinala.api nannaththarayi.ee ape karumelu.ithin pin karannalu.puluwan tharam maha sangharathnayata dan dennalu.ena aathmedi ara kattiya atharata yanna puluwan.nathnam diwiya loke,dekak na.ee unnansela apita athharinna kiyamin hondata ekkahu koranawa.mewan pinbimak thawath natha.loketama ekayi.

mama loku ayiyalath adunana nisa wiwekaya welawedi matath katha kala sellam karanna.matath ganak naha.edama unata daham pasal giye mamath wiraya wage dan wali maluwe set ekath ekka gas paninawa.oya asse lokuma set eka kellanta wihilu karanawa.oya loku set eken bagayakata wada mawa adunanawa.oya athare pansale abiththa siya ara akkala lagata awith eyalath ekka loku set ekata kochok koranna gaththa.mamath dan sellam karana gaman horata okkoma balagena.oya athare eka eka ethanin shep wuna.kohomahari anthimata dahayak withara hitapu set eken hatharak pahak witharayi dan inne.muntikata dan uuru juwal.mokada aathal eke kellekta wihiluwak karanna thibunu chans ekak siya awith kawane.
